title: What songs mention the band name that sings the song in the song's lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll admit I’m not sure that every song I mention will have the band name in the lyrics as I’m including those whose band name appear in the title. Ant Music - Adam and the Ants (partial match) Ant Rap - Adam and the Ants (partial match) Andwella - Andwella (though they were Andwella’s Dream when they first released the song) Hey Hey Bad News - Bad News Bad News - Bad News In A Big Country - Big Country Caedmon’s Hymn - Caedmon Strangely Strange but Oddly Normal - Dr Strangely Strange (partial match) Dragon - Dragonmilk (Partial Match) Weaver’s Answer - Family Focus - Focus Goodies Theme - The Goodies Goodies Theme - The Goodies (Yep, there are two themes) Funky Gibbon - The Goodies Custard Pie - The Goodies Baby Samba - The Goodies Race With The Devil - Gun Taxi - Harry Chapin (Partial Match) Sequel - Harry Chapin (Partial Match) Ice Man - Ice I.C.U. - I.C.U. (Inner City Unit) Introspection Part 1 - Introspection Introspection Part 2 - Introspection Iron Butterfly Theme - Iron Butterfly The Last Will And Testament Of Jake Thackray - Jake Thackray In The Court Of The Crimson King - King Crimson (Reversed) Love Is Coming - Love (with a name like Love, there are probably several) Everlasting Love - Love Affair (Partial) A Day Without Love - Love Affair (Partial) Madness - Madness. Madness (is all in the mind) - Madness The One in the Middle - Manfred Mann Theme From Mash (Suicide Is Painless) - The MASH (in title only) I Got My Mojo Working - The Mojos The Monkees Theme - The Monkees Motorhead - Motorhead The Ballad Of Mott The Hoople - Mott The Hoople Groovin’ With Mr Bloe - Mr Bloe Hey Paula - Paul and Paula (Partial) Pretty Thing - The Pretty Things Killer Queen - Queen Some Day One Day - Queen Rats Revenge - The Rats Rich Kids - Rich Kids (Hey You) The Rock Steady Crew - The Rock Steady Crew Scorpio - Scorpions (Not sure this one counts) Lovedrive -Scorpions (Thanks Pete Holder) Seatrain - Seatrain Hersham Boys - Sham 69 (sort of) Shocking You - Shocking Blue (Partial) Skylark - Sky Merry Christmas Everybody - Slade (Kind of - the word they use is Slayed) Ballad For Space Lovers - Space (Title Only) Free Spirit - Spirit Standell’s Love Theme - Standells Stone Angel - Stone Angel Strawberries Mean Love - Strawberry Alarm Clock (Partial) Eye Of The Tiger - Survivor (Partial) T2 - T2 Timebox - Timebox Tuneful Trolley Theme - Tuneful Trolley Two Thirds Baby - Two Thirds Waiting For The Sun - Waiting For The Sun Who Are You - The Who The Wombles (Every song by this band has the word Wombling in it many also include the word Womble) Wooden Horse - Wooden Horse Blackbird - The Wurzels OQ: What songs mention the band name that sings the song in the song's lyrics?
